entry.title: Purple Jasmine Tea-1KG
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Purple Tea Blend
Price: 140.00

Purple Jasmine: A cup of Purple Jasmine is fresh and delicate. The enchanting fragrance of real jasmine blossoms creates the perfect pairing of tea and flowers.

Tasting Notes: Light & Floral. Spring Jasmine & Honey

Makes 40 cups. Re-steep this whole leaf tea for 80 cups

Steeping Instructions: 1 Teaspoon –175°F – 2 mins

100% Natural Ingredients: Jasmine Green Tea, Kenyan Purple Tea, Jasmine Blossoms, Cornflower Blossoms.

Caffeine: Low

Features: Did you know that all tea comes from the jade green leaves of the tea tree, except for purple tea? This unique variety yields beautiful, vibrant purple leaves! Grown organically, these tea leaves are naturally purple because they contain anthocyanins, the same super antioxidants found in other purple plants like blueberries and pomegranates. Similar to green tea, Purple Tea is very healthy, with little caffeine and an exquisite taste. Your purchase directly employs Kenyan tea farmers.

Price: 16.00

Green tea accentuated by specially selected May jasmine blossoms.

Luxury Ingredients: Green Tea, Jasmine Flowers.
Grown: China

Steeping Instructions:  175°F – 3 mins

Caffeine: Low

entry.title: Matcha Tea Whisk-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Accessory
Price: 19.00

Grand River Tea matcha tea Whisk is made from biodegradable bamboo.

 

Perfect tool for creating your daily matcha.  Try it with our Matcha Green, Organic Hibiscus Matcha Herbal or Masala Chai Match Black.

entry.title: Mason Jar Matcha Green- 70G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 24.99


Tea will be packed in a zero waste 250ML mason jar.

There is perhaps no tea on today's market as celebrated or as famous as Matcha.

Once upon a time Matcha was left for the very special Japanese Tea Ceremony. 

But we've relaxed our use of matcha.  It can be served cold, added to your favourite smoothie, baked good or make yourself a latte.

Our matcha is made from the Gyokuro leaves that have been shaded under special shade covers for 3 weeks giving the leaves a rich green colour.  Once plucked, the leaves are steamed and dried then stone ground powder.

Matcha has three times the amount of antioxidants of regular green tea.

Hot Tea: Use 1/2 teaspoon per 8 ounces of hot water.  Mix vigorously to make a smooth paste-like liquid.  Enjoy as is or top with freshly steamed milk and sweeten to taste.

Ingredients: Green Tea

Grown: Japan and Kenya

entry.title: Organic Strawberry Green- 25 Pyramids
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 16.00

Very refreshing and reflective. Lush ripe strawberry notes and aroma fill the cup leading to an astringent finish.
Luxury Ingredients: Green tea*, Papaya* + Strawberry pieces*, Natural flavors(organic compliant). *Organic 
Tea(s) From: China
Region(s): Hunan Province
Steeping Instructions:  Brew 2-4 minutes at 150-160F

entry.title: Flowering Green Tea Ball
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 3.00

Artisan handcrafted tea ball. The infused green tea is a delight with the benefit of beautiful flowers blooming before your eyes.  Whether it's a special occasion with friends or just because. 
You'll love our unique four flowering tea balls.  Each ball has amaranth, jasmine, chrysanthemum and lavender flowers wrapped up with green tea leaves.
Luxury Ingredients: Green Tea, Amaranth, Jasmine, Chrysanthemum, Lavender Flowers

Grown: China
Place ball in your favourite glass teapot and add 194F boiled water.  Infuse until the ball is fully open around 5 minutes.  Watch the leaves and flowers unfurl.

entry.title: Premium White Gold-20G-White Tea-Limited Quantity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: White
Price: 11.50

After one whole year of waiting Grand River Tea has obtained one pound of this extremely rare white tea from Kenya.  
It takes a full day to pick a half a pound of Premium White Gold.
Enjoy this tea all day long and re-steep throughout the day.  The flavour is light, florally and creamy.  Similar to silver needle white tea. Same process. Put this in your treasure tea chest and savour. 

Grown: Kenya

Ingredients:  White Tea

Steeping Instructions: 1 tsp for 3-7 minutes with 180 Deg F.  Tea leave can be re brewed up to three times

Caffeine: Low

entry.title: Organic Sencha Fuji Green- 50g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 10.00

Delicious green tea character with depth, body and some pungency. Cup tends bright forest green.
Luxury Ingredients: Green tea* *Organic Certified Organic by Pro-Cert Organic Systems 
Grown: Japan/China
Brew 1 teaspoon in 8 o/z water at 175F

Re brew a second time.

entry.title: Perfect Cup Spoon-Stainless Steel-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Accessory
Price: 9.00

Measure the perfect amount of loose leaf tea for every delicious cup of tea.

Our Perfect Cup Spoon will ensure you get a consistent cup of tea everytime.

Stainless steel 18/8

entry.title: Organic Green Yaupon- 40G-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Yaupon
Price: 15.00

 

Organic Green yaupon is not roasted like our medium roast yaupon.  It's dried in the same way as green tea which is minimally processed. Steep these beautiful green leaves the same as any green tea.

Here we are in the 21st century and it has been revived as a sustainable tea.

It's sustainably wild-harvested, hand packed and the only thing touches this plant is sunshine and rain.

Packed in a  kraft bag which is biodegradable.  

Brew 1 teaspoon in 8 ounces of water for 4 -7 minutes

Re-brew up to three times

Perfect for iced tea!

Grown: Texas, USA

entry.title: Grosche Laval Tea Infuser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grosche
Type: Accessory
Price: 12.00

The GROSCHE LAVAL loose tea infuser is perfect for any cup, mug, or small teapot. The LAVAL is suitable for all loose leaf teas and won’t allow leaves to seep into your tea. It is made from 18-8 stainless steel and can hold enough loose leaf tea for 2-3 steeps. It is easily removable with the lip of the infuser.

Your purchase of this product, GROSCHE is able to provide 50+ days of safe drinking water to someone in need.

entry.title: Genmaicha Green 50G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 9.00

Toasty and bakey with slight buttery notes. Popped rice kernels provide an excellent visual and imparts the unique flavour of the tea. Green tea is very high in antioxidants.
Luxury Ingredients: Green tea, Roasted + Popped Rice.

Grown: Japan
Brew: 1 teaspoon for 3 Minutes 175 Deg. F
Caffeine Content: Low

entry.title: Gift Card-Grand River Tea
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Gift Card
Price: 10.00 - 100.00 (4 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Grand River Tea gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions on how to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

entry.title: Lavender Green-50G-New
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 9.00

Premium green tea with a floral and astringent finish. Lavender notes abound creating a tea for memories.  Sit back relax and take in the flavour and aroma.
Luxury Ingredients: Green tea, Lavender petals
Grown: China
Caffeine: Low
Brew: 1 Tsp for 3 minutes 175 deg F.

entry.title: Mason Jar Kenyan Green Tea-50G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 10.00

Packed in a zero waste 250ML mason jar.  

A clean and smooth green tea that is unlike any other green tea on the market. Whole tea leaves steep multiple infusions of vibrant green liquor.  A must-have for any green tea drinker!

Non GMO, Rain Forest Certified and Fair Trade Certified.

Tasting Notes: Crisp asparagus, fresh cabbage and toasted oats.

Re-steep these whole tea leaves 2-3 times 

Steeping Instructions: 1 tea spoon – 175°F – 3 mins

Ingredients: Kenyan Green Tea

Features:
The only tea from Kenya plucked, processed and shipped from small-scale farmers! Pesticide free. No chemicals are ever sprayed on the tea leaves.
Artisanal tea leaves… You will be amazed at the giant tea leaves steeping deliciousness in your cup.  Once unfurled, you can see the actual whole leaf that the farmer carefully hand-plucked from their Nandi Hills tea garden.

entry.title: Organic Osprey Gunpowder Green-50G
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: Green Tea
Price: 10.00

A special, new season green tea with surprising body and a captivating taste.
You'll love how the leaves unfurl.  Re brew your green tea a couple of times. Don't waste a drop. 
Luxury Ingredients: Green tea* *Organic Certified Organic by Pro-Cert Organic Systems 

Caffeine 
Grown: China
Brew for 2-3 minutes

There is perhaps no tea on today's market as celebrated or as famous as Matcha.

entry.title: Organic Pai Mu Tan White Tea-30g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grand River Tea
Type: White
Price: 13.00

Clear slightly pale cup with a fresh aroma and a smooth velvety flavour. Delicate jammy notes reminiscent of Keemun or a mild Bordeaux. Only the bud and two leaves are selected for this lovely spring grade white tea. This is a rare tea.  Lovely for special occasions or a quite indulgence.  This tea make a wonderful infused white wine. 

Grown: China

Ingredients: Organic White Tea

Steeping Instructions: 1 tsp for 3-7 minutes with 180 Deg F.  Tea leave can be re brewed up to three times

Caffeine: Low
entry.s:tag: organic pai mu tan white tea
